column2:
Based on the instructions you have just read, once a story is pitched to you what do
you have to do?
Please re-read the study instructions above if you are not sure. You will have two
opportunities to get this question correct.
column3: Judge how well written they are | Sort them into positive or negative reviews | Nothing
column4:
You are a senior editor at a daily newspaper. You have two major tasks: First, many
journalists keep pitching stories to you. You are the one who must sort them into positive or
negative news, while your fact-checking department verifies their content. Second, once
you get the actual true story from your fact-checking department, it is your responsibility to
check that a photo that someone from your photography department has proposed to go
with the story actually matches with the true story (yes vs. no) that was verified by your fact-
checking department.

column2:
Based on the instructions you have just read, once you get the true story what do
you have to do?
Please re-read the study instructions above if you are not sure. You will have two
opportunities to get this question correct.
column3: Rate how accurate it is | Nothing | Check that the photo provided matches the true story
column4:
You are a senior editor at a daily newspaper. You have two major tasks: First, many
journalists keep pitching stories to you. You are the one who must sort them into positive or
negative news, while your fact-checking department verifies their content. Second, once
you get the actual true story from your fact-checking department, it is your responsibility to
check that a photo that someone from your photography department has proposed to go
with the story actually matches with the true story (yes vs. no) that was verified by your fact-
checking department.

column2: If you fit those criteria, would you like to be invited to that study?

column4:
One last thing before you go! 

We are planning another study and we're looking for specific people to take part in it. Because we're looking for people with specific characteristics, we'll be offering a considerably higher pay for a relatively short study (the effective rate may be $20 an hour). 

The type of people we are currently looking for should be 1) Female and 2) Between the ages of 49 to 58.
